PilotQuestion.text: Is you flight instructor female?
Are you no showing your next flight simply because you do not give a shit?
Is your personal policy "8 hour bottle to... screw it"?
Do you want to be a part 141 instructor?
When you fly, do you only wear a headset and socks?
I use my checklist
I failed a check ride... because my check pilot is a douche!
In your last flight, did takeoffs not equal landings?
Are you supposed to be preflighting right now?
My instructor and I love this flight school?
Is your last name Sullenberg?
Do you intentionally avoid direct eye contact with your instructor just to piss him off?
I am not paying for my last flight!
Have you ever responded "roger" to a text that required a one word answer?
Do you know what 91.61 is?

When your instructor says "take this book and read chapter __ over the weekend", do you commit the following: Take the book, Bring it home, Never open it, Get wasted, Lose the book, No show your next activity, Then switch instructors?
Have you ever Jettisoned your instructors flight bag?
Do you use your non-existent pilot stat to get laid?
Airbus over Boeing?
LOOK THERES A F22 OVERHEAD!...                   ...Did you look up?
Have you ever woken up at 3:30 just to plan a cross country only for your flight instructor to cancel?
Is your self worth dependent upon your pilot rating?
Are you a real pilot?
Is flying learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss?
